name: Match 3: PvP Match 3
shortDescription: A fast-paced, competitive Match 3 puzzle game featuring futuristic avatars, turn-based PvP combat, and a robust clan/team system.
fullDescription:
Match 3: PvP Match 3 is a real-time, competitive Match 3 puzzle game set in a futuristic, neon-lit theme. The core gameplay involves two opponents competing on the same board, taking turns to match colorful gems with a time limit for each move. The game features an 'EXTRA MOVE!' mechanic to reward high-scoring matches.

Key Features:

  • PvP Gameplay: Engage in head-to-head, turn-based matches with a strict time limit for strategic play.
  • Clan/Team System: 'Create Team' (requiring Trophies and currency) or 'Join' others for team-based competition and social interaction.
  • Monetization & Shop: Features a dual currency system (Coins and a premium currency/Gems). The shop includes purchasing coin packs and obtaining tiered loot boxes (Common, Uncommon, Epic).
  • Progression & Social: Includes options for 'Tournament' play, 'Edit Avatar', and a Trophy-based progression system.
